# HELP test_special_values Metrics with special float values
# TYPE test_special_values gauge
test_special_values{type="normal"} 42.5
test_special_values{type="zero"} 0
test_special_values{type="negative"} -123.45
test_special_values{type="positive_infinity"} +Inf
test_special_values{type="negative_infinity"} -Inf
test_special_values{type="nan"} NaN
